Text.Value: |She returns to looking at the head, gently brushing her fingers upon its cheek.|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
|She turns her attention towards you, now in clear view of the object in her hand. The head of her father lost in a vacant gaze.|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
|A figure that looks a lot like Shadowheart is knelt over and sofly crying, holding something close to her chest.|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

|The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

Synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.
